it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.ipconfig

Class HostConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.ipconfig.HostConfigurator

  • public abstract class HostConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object
    HostConfigurator is the basic object used to configure the ip stack of the host OS. The abstract method configure() must be extended in order to obtain a platform dependent configuration.
